title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 502.4 - Amendments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 502.4 - Amendments

State Regulations

The commissioner or presiding officer may allow any
application, answer, or other paper to be supplemented, amended or corrected, provided such amendment does not unduly broaden the issues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
502.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
